Key Match Events: Brooks Lee's two-run single in the sixth inning gave the Twins the lead.
Carlos Santana hit a two-run homer in the seventh inning.
Spencer Steer hit an RBI triple in the fourth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Rocco Baldelli praised the team's performance and the ability to break through after trailing.
Brooks Lee mentioned the importance of getting on base and the contagious nature of hitting.
Carlos Santana expressed satisfaction with the win and the team's effort.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins maintained a 2.5-game lead in the AL wild card race.
The game was the Twins' fourth win in 12 games.
